ygData.subject: Alive
ygData.msgSnippet: Unitron: Unitron couldn t move, he couldn t do anything.  He didn t know what was going on, and if he wasn t of such a strong will, he d go insane with fear.

Unitron:



Unitron couldn't move, he couldn't do anything.  He didn't know what was 
going on, and if he wasn't of such a strong will, he'd go insane with fear.
